languages.text: "Черни хватило смелости взбунтоваться, так что кто знает. Ах, при всем уважении, миледи Вьятт слишком нежничала с этими червями! При ее деде слуги взгляд боялись на дворянина поднять, не то что руку!"

traits.locale_text: "Черни хватило смелости взбунтоваться, так что кто знает. Ах, при всем уважении, миледи Вьятт слишком нежничала с этими червями! При ее деде слуги взгляд боялись на дворянина поднять, не то что руку!"

languages.text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"
languages.original_text: "Черни хватило смелости взбунтоваться, так что кто знает. Ах, при всем уважении, миледи Вьятт слишком нежничала с этими червями! При ее деде слуги взгляд боялись на дворянина поднять, не то что руку!"

traits.locale_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

"The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

"The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

"The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

languages.text: 「反乱を起こすなんて、暴徒はよほどの怖い物知らずだったということでしょうか？恐れながら申し上げますと、レディ・ビャットはあんな虫けら相手に甘すぎるのです！おじいさまの時代なら、己の目を貴族に向けることすら農奴は恐れていたものです。実力行使なんて尚のこと！」
languages.original_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

traits.locale_text: 「反乱を起こすなんて、暴徒はよほどの怖い物知らずだったということでしょうか？恐れながら申し上げますと、レディ・ビャットはあんな虫けら相手に甘すぎるのです！おじいさまの時代なら、己の目を貴族に向けることすら農奴は恐れていたものです。実力行使なんて尚のこと！」

languages.text: “这群暴民居然敢造反，谁能想得到呢？恕我直言，维亚特女士对这些蛀虫实在是太仁慈了！若是换做她祖父的时代，那些农奴都不敢直视贵族，更别说动手了！”
languages.original_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

traits.locale_text: “这群暴民居然敢造反，谁能想得到呢？恕我直言，维亚特女士对这些蛀虫实在是太仁慈了！若是换做她祖父的时代，那些农奴都不敢直视贵族，更别说动手了！”

languages.text: «El populacho ha tenido la audacia de rebelarse, de modo que ¿quién sabe? Con todo el debido respeto, ¡lady Vyatt ha sido demasiado blanda con estos gusanos! En tiempos de su abuelo, ningún plebeyo habría osado levantar la mirada frente a un noble, ¡no digamos ya la mano!».
languages.original_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

traits.locale_text: «El populacho ha tenido la audacia de rebelarse, de modo que ¿quién sabe? Con todo el debido respeto, ¡lady Vyatt ha sido demasiado blanda con estos gusanos! En tiempos de su abuelo, ningún plebeyo habría osado levantar la mirada frente a un noble, ¡no digamos ya la mano!».

languages.text: "Das Gesindel war mutig genug für eine Rebellion, also wer weiß? Bei allem Respekt, Lady Vyatt war zu nachsichtig mit diesen Würmern! Zu Zeiten ihres Großvaters hätten Leibeigene zu einem Adligen nicht einmal aufgeblickt, geschweige denn die Hand gegen ihn erhoben!"
languages.original_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Gesindel war mutig genug für eine Rebellion, also wer weiß? Bei allem Respekt, Lady Vyatt war zu nachsichtig mit diesen Würmern! Zu Zeiten ihres Großvaters hätten Leibeigene zu einem Adligen nicht einmal aufgeblickt, geschweige denn die Hand gegen ihn erhoben!"

languages.text: « La populace a bien eu assez d'audace pour se rebeller, alors qui sait ? Malgré tout le respect que je lui dois, dame Vyatt s'est montrée trop laxiste avec cette vermine ! À l'époque de son grand-père, un serf n'aurait jamais osé lever les yeux sur un noble, et encore moins la main ! »
languages.original_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

traits.locale_text: « La populace a bien eu assez d'audace pour se rebeller, alors qui sait ? Malgré tout le respect que je lui dois, dame Vyatt s'est montrée trop laxiste avec cette vermine ! À l'époque de son grand-père, un serf n'aurait jamais osé lever les yeux sur un noble, et encore moins la main ! »

languages.text: "Ayaktakımı isyan çıkaracak cüreti kendinde bulmuş, yani kim bilir... Saygısızlık olarak algılamayın ama Leydi Vyatt bu solucanlara fazla yumuşak davrandı! Büyükbabasının zamanında tebaayı bırakın soylulara el kaldırmayı, başlarını kaldırıp gözlerine bakamazlardı bile!"
languages.original_text: "The rabble were audacious enough to rebel, so who knows? With all due respect, Lady Vyatt has been too soft on these worms! In her grandfather's time, a serf would have feared to raise his eyes to a noble, let alone his hand!"

traits.locale_text: "Ayaktakımı isyan çıkaracak cüreti kendinde bulmuş, yani kim bilir? Saygısızlık olarak algılamayın ama Leydi Vyatt bu solucanlara fazla yumuşak davrandı! Büyükbabasının zamanında tebaaları bırakın soylulara el kaldırmayı, başlarını kaldırıp gözlerine bakamazlardı bile!"
